ISSUE.TITLE: feat: body-transformer enhancement
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Description ### current status #### 1、Backend returns gzip not supported When the backend returns gzip data, the decoding will be garbled. i want to fix it #### 2、Data using x-ww-form-urlencoded format is not supported When the client sends a request format of x-www-form-urlencoded, Unable to parse parameter #### 3、Parameter parsing and conversion of get requests are not supported When the client sends a get request, Unable to parse parameter ### target I want to add these features which are not supported right now 1. Support backend to return gzip data 2. Support the use of x-www-form-urlencoded format 3. Support the use of get requests
